article:
Android IPC - Tutorial
Lars Vogel
2011 2012 2013 2014 vogella GmbH
10.11.2014
Version 2.9
How to do Android IPC with parceable and AIDLs
This tutorial describes how to create your own Parceable implementaton and how to do IPC beetween an activity and service. It is based on Eclipse 4.4, Java 1.6 and Android 4.4.
